message.body: Townes on the radio. You should send me more good music.
Only in Minnesota would they play Townes on the radio.
I know you're jealous, but you don't need to be sassy... I was thinking about you and fathers day. Are you ok?
In this moment, no. But ive been doing alright with it
Ill be praying. Is there anything I can do to help?
Thanks you. Naw, he holds the cards
I just know you felt like you haven't had anyone to talk to about big stuff. I wasn't ready to be a friend before but I am now. So let me know because I care about you.
That means quite a lot, thank you marfa.
